items.content_html:
In most of the unpleasant situations in life everything boils down to three choices.

  • Live with it;
  • Leave it;
  • Change it.

This happens to me again and again. People tell me that yet another llm “thinks differently”. Boring. As A. C. Clark famously wrote in (!)1962:

Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Which side are you on: does “it think”, or simply “it produces”?
